short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A quick and simple way to shorten URLs with Kay.so

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kay.so URL Shortener provides a quick and simple extension that allows you to shorten any website URL you're visiting with a click of a button using the Kay.so service.

Upon shortening a link, it will be automatically copied to the clipboard. To check the stats for a link, visit: http://kay.so/stats/


The latest update includes updated icons and a right click context menu that allows you to instantly copy short URLs to the clipboard for links, images, and even the current page you're viewing!
